title: Blueberry white chocolate cheesecake
ingredients: ['For the base', '250g digestive biscuits, finely crushed', '55g white chocolate, melted', '55g unsalted butter, melted', 'For the filling', '2 teaspoons powdered gelatine', '2 tablespoons water', '250g cream cheese', '150ml soured cream', '80g caster sugar', '150g fresh blueberries, pureed', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
